name: NoCruelty Simulator
description:
--- A 100% CRUELTY FREE GAME! Or maybe... not ---
Use your butcher's knife to PET cute animals and get Score
Made for Trijam #166 - Theme: Upgrade your weapons
Get score to upgrade your Butcher's Knife

Controls:
WASD, Lmouse Click to shoot your petting knife
Pet cows for bonus time

Follow Social Media for Game Updates! https://twitter.com/GalakatWhity
SUPPORT the project if you want to, i will appreciate your help <3
